languages.text: "Урок смирения. Его власть растоптана, а мятеж захлебнулся. Владайма больше нет — есть лишь заблудший слуга Императора. Служение вернет его на путь истинный".

traits.locale_text: "Урок смирения. Его власть растоптана, а мятеж захлебнулся. Владайма больше нет — есть лишь заблудший слуга Императора. Служение вернет его на путь истинный".

languages.text: "A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."
languages.original_text: "Урок смирения. Его власть растоптана, а мятеж захлебнулся. Владайма больше нет — есть лишь заблудший слуга Императора. Служение вернет его на путь истинный".

"A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."

languages.text: “会让他学到何为谦卑。他从权力的巅峰一落千丈，他的叛乱以失败告终。弗拉迪姆已经不复存在，如今在这里的人，仅仅是一个迷失方向的帝皇仆人。服苦役的日子会让他重新踏上正途。”
languages.original_text: "A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."

traits.locale_text: “会让他学到何为谦卑。他从权力的巅峰一落千丈，他的叛乱以失败告终。弗拉迪姆已经不复存在，如今在这里的人，仅仅是一个迷失方向的帝皇仆人。服苦役的日子会让他重新踏上正途。”

languages.text: 「教訓は謙虚なものだ。彼の権力はボロボロで、反乱も起こらなかった。かつてのヴラダイムはもう存在しない。残されたのは、道に迷った皇帝の召使だけだ。隷属は奴を真の道へと連れ戻すだろう」
languages.original_text: "A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."

traits.locale_text: 「教訓は謙虚なものだ。彼の権力はボロボロで、反乱も起こらなかった。かつてのヴラダイムはもう存在しない。残されたのは、道に迷った皇帝の召使だけだ。隷属は奴を真の道へと連れ戻すだろう」

languages.text: «Una lección de humildad. Su poder está por los suelos y su rebelión nunca cuajó. Vladaym ya no existe, lo único que queda de él es un sirviente del Emperador que ha perdido el rumbo. La servidumbre le devolverá al verdadero camino».
languages.original_text: "A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."

traits.locale_text: «Una lección de humildad. Su poder está por los suelos y su rebelión nunca cuajó. Vladaym ya no existe, lo único que queda de él es un sirviente del Emperador que ha perdido el rumbo. La servidumbre le devolverá al verdadero camino».

languages.text: "Eine Lektion in Demut. Seine Macht ist zertrümmert, seine Rebellion wurde im Keim erstickt. Vladaym ist nicht länger: Es ist nur noch ein Diener des Imperators übrig, der vom Weg abgekommen ist. Der Dienst wird ihn wieder auf den richtigen Pfad führen."
languages.original_text: "A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Lektion in Demut. Seine Macht ist zertrümmert, seine Rebellion wurde im Keim erstickt. Vladaym ist nicht länger: Es ist nur noch ein Diener des Imperators übrig, der vom Weg abgekommen ist. Der Dienst wird ihn wieder auf den richtigen Pfad führen."

languages.text: « Une leçon d'humilité. Sa rébellion a échoué et son pouvoir n'est plus qu'un lointain souvenir. Vladaym n'est désormais rien d'autre qu'un serviteur de l'Empereur qui s'est égaré. La servitude le ramènera dans le droit chemin. »
languages.original_text: "A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."

traits.locale_text: « Une leçon d'humilité. Sa rébellion a échoué et son pouvoir n'est plus qu'un lointain souvenir. Vladaym n'est désormais rien d'autre qu'un serviteur de l'Empereur qui s'est égaré. La servitude le ramènera dans le droit chemin. »

languages.text: "Alçak gönüllülük dersi. Gücünü kaybetti, isyanı başlayamadı bile. Vladaym'ın işi bitti. Ondan geriye bir tek İmparator'un yolunu kaybetmiş bir hizmetkârı kaldı. Hizmet etmek onu doğru yola geri sokacaktır."
languages.original_text: "A lesson in humility. His power is in shambles, and his rebellion never took off. Vladaym is no more: all that is left is a servant of the Emperor who has lost his way. Servitude will bring him back to the true path."

traits.locale_text: "Bir alçakgönüllülük dersi. Gücü darmadağın oldu ve isyanı faaliyete geçemedi. Vladaym'ın işi bitti. Geriye tek kalan, İmparator'un yolunu kaybetmiş bir hizmetkârı. Hizmet etmek onu doğru yola geri sokacaktır."
